#include<iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main(void)
{
    int n, m, s=0, xp, i, j;
    const int M = 1009;
    cin >> n >> m;
    m %= M;
    int *a, *x;
    a = new int [n+1];
    x = new int [m+1];
    for (i = n; i>=0; i--)
    {
        cin >> a[i];
        a[i] %= M;
    }
    for (j = 0; j<= m; j++)
    {
        x[j] = 1;
    }
    for (i = 0; i<=n; i++)
    {
        if (i>0)
        {
            for (j = 0; j <= m; j++)
            {
                x[j] = (x[j]*j)%M;
            }
        }
        xp = 0;
        for(j = 0; j<= m; j++)xp += x[j];
        s += (a[i] * xp)%M;
    }
    //for (j = 0; j <= m; j++)cout << x[j];
    cout << s%M;
    delete[] a;
}
